1.title: Episode #1.1

episode of.title: One Day That Changed My Life (TV Series 2018–2019)

1.plot: Carol undergoes surgery which could restore her hearing. Alison and Chad risk their home on launching a new business. Laura takes her train-driving test. Izzy gives hope to Olympic hopefuls.

2.title: Episode #1.2

episode of.title: One Day That Changed My Life (TV Series 2018–2019)

2.plot: Gary tries for the final time to become a London taxi driver, after 32 failed attempts. Beth races towards a place in Team GB's canoeing squad. Emmet enters the world of competitive barbering. Alex and Sarah hope to adopt a child.

3.title: Episode #1.3

episode of.title: One Day That Changed My Life (TV Series 2018–2019)

3.plot: Mark waits to find out if his cancer has returned, David is determined to be crowned butcher of the year, Louise and Mark struggle with the process of IVF, profoundly deaf Melissa tries to break into show-business.

4.title: Episode #1.4

episode of.title: One Day That Changed My Life (TV Series 2018–2019)

4.plot: Villagers wait to discover if they can save their local pub, MS sufferer Tracey sees if a dog can help her, Bethany takes a blood test for a cancer causing gene, Chris discovers if he can become a pro footballer.

5.title: Episode #1.5

episode of.title: One Day That Changed My Life (TV Series 2018–2019)

5.plot: Amreeta undergoes intricate surgery that could restore her sight, spina bifida sufferer Luke takes his driving test, Donald and Sue wait to hear if they can foster, Nik and Caroline launch into the street food market.

episode of.title: One Day That Changed My Life (TV Series 2018–2019)

imdb.title: One Day That Changed My Life
akas: One Day That Changed My Life (United Kingdom)
plot: Moving documentary series following people as they go through pivotal experiences in their lives - ranging from applying for their dream job to a musician undergoing surgery that could restore her hearing.::Mark_a_Wood <markawood@hotmail.co.uk>
